name: Balance Water Tras#
author: join_da_hype
notes:
Pretty smooth end season KOG with this absolute garbaj. Opened the box for alien but couldn't complete the deck (4k++ no alien warrior and braimwashing still) so I quickly build this,
SSA is good right now, I only lost once to a better water deck during legend 2. Although my promo game was against a better water deck but i was quite lucky with my draw.
